property.name: livy.session.lifetime.minutes
property.description: Maximum time in minutes a session can be active before it is swapped

property.name: livy.session.lifetime.requests
property.description: Maximum number of requests processed by a session before it is swapped

property.name: livy.session.max.errors
property.description: Maximum number of attempts for session creation. Session will be declared dead after these many retries

property.name: livy.session.config.read.name
property.description: The name of read session

property.name: livy.session.config.read.heartbeatTimeoutInSecond
property.description: Timeout in seconds to which read session be orphaned

property.name: livy.session.config.read.timeoutInSeconds
property.description: Timeout in seconds for requests to read session

property.name: livy.session.config.read.queue
property.description: Yarn queue for read sessions

property.name: livy.session.config.read.driverMemory
property.description: Amount of memory to use for the driver process for read session E.g. 1g

property.name: livy.session.config.read.driverCores
property.description: Number of cores to use for the driver process for read session E.g. 1

property.name: livy.session.config.read.executorMemory
property.description: Amount of memory to use per executor process for read session E.g. 1g

property.name: livy.session.config.read.executorCores
property.description: Number of cores to use for each executor for read session E.g. 1

property.name: livy.session.config.read.numExecutors
property.description: Number of executors to launch for read session E.g. 1
